name: TextMine-pg
short_description:
This is still experimental code, though most of the code is now fully functional, allowing the 2006 version of TextMine to run with Postgresql instead of Mysql. The original version is here: 
 http://textmine.sourceforge.net/
The code waiting to be implemented provides local administration of the textmine postgresql database.  
For the original web pages outlining the features and working description see the above link. Some additional notes are included, but these are a work-in-progress. 
You will need a working knowledge of linux, perl, apache2, postgresql and its perl interface to get this to run. 
This is a non-trivial project, hence expect to spend a few hours setting it up before you can do any useful work.
summary: postgresql version of M Konchadys TextMine
